text: The High Inspectorate of Declaration and Audit of Assets and Conflicts of Interest (HIDAACI) () is a government agency in Albania under the supervision of the Inspector General. The task of the agency is to administer the audit of the declaration of assets of public individuals.https://www.ata.gov.al/te- ngarkuara/Programi%20i%20Transparences/ligj_9049_2003_ildkp.pdfInspektoriati i Lartë i Deklarimit dhe Kontrollit të Pasurive ==References== Category:Financial system of Albania Category:Finance agencies of Albania Category:Albania stubs
title: HIDAACI (Albania)
